briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of IDP-121 and IDP-121 Vehicle Lotion in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, 2-Arm, Parallel Group Comparison Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of IDP-121 and IDP-121 Vehicle Lotion in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
summary: The objective of this study was to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of a once daily topical application of IDP-121 Lotion compared with its vehicle (IDP-121 Vehicle Lotion) in participants with moderate to severe acne vulgaris (acne) (that is, acne having an Evaluator's Global Severity Score \[EGSS\] of 3 \[moderate\] or 4 \[severe\]).

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change From Baseline in Mean Noninflammatory Lesion Count to Week 12
